aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan Details
The accident site had Visual Meteorological Conditions (VMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was Day.
The observation facility was DRA at an elevation of 3,314 feet mean sea level.
The observation facility was located 45 Nautical Miles from the accident site.
The observation time was 05:52 Local.
The observation facility was located 355° from the accident site.
The lowest cloud condition at the accident site was Clear.
The visibility at the accident site was 10 miles.
There was no ceiling at the accident site.
No wind speed or gusts were reported.
There was no turbulence forecast.
No actual turbulence was reported.
No wind direction was reported.
No turbulence severity was forecast.
No actual turbulence severity was reported.
The altimeter setting was 29.9 inches of mercury.
The temperature was 20°C.
The dew point was 3°C.
There was no obscuration at the accident site.
There was no precipitation at the accident site.
The departure point was Las Vegas, Nevada (VGT).
No flight plan was filed.
The destination was Las Vegas, Nevada (VGT).
No clearance was issued.
The departure time was 06:05 Local.
The airspace was Class G.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

## Conditions at Accident Site:
Visual (VMC)

## Condition of Light:
Day

## Observation Facility, Elevation:
DRA,3314 ft msl

## Distance from Accident Site:
45 Nautical Miles

## Observation Time:
05:52 Local

## Direction from Accident Site:
355°

## Lowest Cloud Condition:
Clear

## Visibility
10 miles

## Lowest Ceiling:
None

## Visibility (RVR):

## Wind Speed/Gusts:
 / 

## Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual:
 / None

## Wind Direction:
Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual:
 / 

## Altimeter Setting:
29.9 inches Hg

## Temperature/Dew Point:
20°C / 3°C

## Precipitation and Obscuration:
No Obscuration; No Precipitation

## Departure Point:
LAS VEGAS, NV (VGT )

## Type of Flight Plan Filed:
None

## Destination:
LAS VEGAS, NV (VGT )

## Type of Clearance:
None

## Departure Time:
06:05 Local

## Type of Airspace:
Class G
